sentences.en: "Dear boy," she crooned, hugging him heartily.
sentences.cn: “乖儿子，”她轻声说着，把他紧紧地抱在怀里。

sentences.en: Gill seized my hand and shook it heartily.
sentences.cn: 吉尔突然抓住我的手,热情地和我握手.

sentences.en: He ate heartily and went out to look for his horse.
sentences.cn: 他痛快地吃了一顿,就出去找他的马.

sentences.en: He ate heartily but would drink only beer.
sentences.cn: 他敞开胃口大吃，却只喝啤酒。

sentences.en: He laughed heartily at his own joke.
sentences.cn: 他被自己的笑话逗得开怀大笑.

sentences.en: He was heartily satisfied with the arrangement.
sentences.cn: 他对这样安排感到由衷的满意.

sentences.en: I am heartily sick of them.
I heartily agree with her favourable comments on Germany and France.
sentences.cn: 我十分赞同她对德国和法国的好评。

sentences.en: I heartily agree with her on this.
sentences.cn: 在这一点上我十分赞同她。

sentences.en: I heartily subscribe to that sentiment.
Most Afghans are heartily sick of war.
sentences.cn: 大多数阿富汗人痛恨战争。

sentences.en: The audience clapped the violinist heartily.
sentences.cn: 观众热烈地向提琴手鼓掌.

sentences.en: The host seized my hand and shook it heartily.
sentences.cn: 主人抓住我的手,热情地和我握手.

sentences.en: This is a book I heartily recommend to all hill walkers.
sentences.cn: 我向所有山区健行者大力推荐这本书。
